attributes.additional_details:
What do you think about this?

Gravesend Police Station is possibly allowing an 18 year old man, with dark hair, to use the Police computer at night time, for illegal practice. He is not a qualified member of staff. Police equipment should be used by qualified members. He is still being paid a full monthly salary, as far as I know. What a scandal! Rumour has it, that he is trying to create a programmable woman. He is using the premises at night time, for this purpose.

He could be using the premises as housing, also.

Please investigate. No comeback on myself, please.

rejection.details: This is a police operational matter.
